title: Grüne Bandnudeln mit gebratenem Spargel
instructions: Peel the asparagus and cut it into 2 cm wide diagonal pieces. Meanwhile, bring a pot of salted water to a boil for the noodles. In a deep pan, heat the olive oil and sauté the asparagus with a lid over low heat for 10 minutes. Cook the noodles in salted water. Add the diced garlic to the asparagus, and then sauté the asparagus uncovered over higher heat, lightly caramelizing it with sugar. After three more minutes, season the vegetables with salt, pepper, and a pinch of crumbled oregano. Add the butter and mix with the noodles and Parmesan. A green salad and a dry white wine pair well with this dish.
